author: fwyzard
body:
The main changes since CUDA 11.5.x are
  - support for Lovelace (sm_87) and Hopper (sm_90) architectures (since CUDA 11.8)
  - support for GCC 12
  - support for C++20 (with GCC 10 and later)

See https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-toolkit-release-notes/index.html for the full CUDA 12.0.x release notes and change log.
title: Update to CUDA 12.0.0 and NVIDIA drivers 525.60.13
